message: Let's start with a fair deal, Bob. You get 10% and I get 90%.  What do you say?
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not giving up too much. You can try to do better than this!
I'm willing to compromise, Bob.  Let's split it 70/30 this time.  I'm sure we can find a solution that benefits us both.
I'm not giving up much more, but I'll try to be reasonable. You can try to do better than this, or we can go back and forth forever.
Bob, we're getting close to the end here. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Let's split it 60/40, and we both get something.
